category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_manage_param_map_on_non_modified_items
preference.preference_description: Use CATIA_manage_param_map_on_non_modified_items to force CATIA parameters to be managed when the Save mode is changed in the Save Manager from Existing to Create New or Save As/Revise. By default (false), CATIA parameters are only managed when the CATPart is modified in CATIA. Set this preference to true to manage CATIA parameters when the CATPart is not modified in CATIA and the Save mode has been changed to Create New or Save As/Revise. In this case, the performance of the Save process may be impacted.
